General.Name: Broendbyernes IF Fodbold AS
General.Description: Brøndbyernes IF Fodbold A/S operates the Brøndbyernes Idrætsforening football club in Denmark. It also operates a football stadium with a capacity of 2, 80,778 spectators located in Brøndby. The company was founded in 1909 and is based in Brøndby, Denmark.
